dct_description_sm: compiled, drawn, and published by the Surveyor General, Ministry of Lands and Natural Resources.
Relief shown by gradient tints, contours, and spot heights.
Map from the World Bank maps collection.
Hand made legend with pasted on lines and symbols showing hydro-electric power stations, thermal stations and diesel stations.
